project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a Python-based quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions to the user, keeps track of their score, and displays the final score at the end of the game.

task.name: Set up the basic structure of the quiz game
Create a variable to store the questions and answers
Implement the logic to ask questions and collect user responses
Keep track of the user's score as they answer questions
Display the final score to the user at the end of the game
Write tests for each of the components of the quiz game
Execute tests on the entire quiz game to ensure functionality
